title: Argentina : poverty headcount ratio at 3.20 U.S. dollars per day 2005 to 2017
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 12 data points.
In general Percentage of population has fallen over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 10.0 was reported at Year 2005
Minimum Percentage of population about 2.0 was reached at Year 2017
